/** * Determines the directory name of the specified file. * * This task can accept the following attributes: *
    *
  • file *
  • property *
* Both file and property are required. *

* When this task executes, it will set the specified property to the * value of the specified file up to, but not including, the last path * element. If file is a file, the directory will be the current * directory. * * * @since Ant 1.5 * * @ant.task category="property" */
